item.title: Construction(cheezscape)(started over and got 5 errors)(might be easy)
item.dc:creator: @Crazyman Crazyman
item.description:
@Crazyman wrote:

HMm its wierd cause on a fresh client i have

public boolean savemoreinfo() { BufferedWriter characterfile = null; try { characterfile = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("./moreinfo/" + playerName + ".txt")); characterfile.write("[MOREINFO]", 0, 10); characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-clueid = ", 0, 19); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(clueid), 0, Integer.toString(clueid).length()); characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-cluelevel = ", 0, 22); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(cluelevel), 0, Integer.toString(cluelevel).length());
and then on the one im using is shows

public boolean char() { BufferedWriter characterfile = null; try { characterfile = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("./moreinfo/" + playerName + ".txt")); characterfile.write("[MOREINFO]", 0, 10); characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-clueid = ", 0, 19); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(clueid), 0, Integer.toString(clueid).length()); characterfile.newLine(); characterfile.write("character-cluelevel = ", 0, 22); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(cluelevel), 0, Integer.toString(cluelevel).length());
that seems very wierd to me[br][size=1]Posted at: October 28, 2006, 01:22:00 PM[/size][hr]IF anyone has msn taht can probably fix my problem? and get into my client to see what is wrong?

add me plz :gjocchipinti@gmail

I give Rep++

Read full topic

client.java:15235: illegal start of expression public int consLevel = 0; ^

client.java:15236: illegal start of expression public int getConsXPForLevel(int level) { ^

client.java:28970: illegal start of type }else if (token.equals("character-conslvl")) { ^

client.java:31141: (identifier) expected } ^

Please help i give rep++
